_header: Of his life of folly and of sin through law
_description: Four irregular lines on the folly of the world

CamGon221.Transcription:
[Of is] lif of foly or of synn þorw lawe &of þe fendis
                    gyse and of is mythof yehele lawe of is wrothe and if hardnesseof deth
                    is dred & of is frichnesse
CamGon221.Note: Four irregular lines, added to lower margin.
